description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/7851888781 at Wed Sep 18 05:10:33 UTC 2024

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

seriesOverrides.alias: /6h Degradation SLO \(5% of monthly error budget\).*/
/1h Outage SLO \(2% of monthly error budget\).*/

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: redis Service Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="redis"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="redis"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="redis"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="redis"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="redis"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_30m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="redis"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="redis"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_6h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="redis"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="redis"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

seriesOverrides.alias: /6h Degradation SLO \(5% of monthly error budget\).*/
/1h Outage SLO \(2% of monthly error budget\).*/

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: redis Service Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="redis"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="redis"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="redis"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="redis"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="redis"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_30m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="redis"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="redis"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_6h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="redis"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="redis"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: redis Service RPS - Requests per Second

panels.description: Saturation is a measure of what ratio of a finite resource is currently being utilized. Lower is better.
panels.title: Saturation
